meta.subtitle: Palia Interactive Map
meta.description: Maximize your Palia gameplay with this Interactive Palia Map! Discover Kilima Valley, Bahari Bay and Fairgrounds, find all locations with real-time position tracking. The weekly wants are also available for all villagers.

download.metaDescription: Download the Palia Map App, your ultimate companion for exploring the Palia world. Enhance your gaming experience with interactive maps, real-time tracking, and more.
download.title: The Palia Map App: Your Ultimate Palia Companion

realTimePosition.title: Real-Time Player Position Tracking
realTimePosition.description: Keep tabs on your in-game character's location with real-time tracking. Whether you're exploring, farming, or hunting, always know where you are on the map.

2ndScreenMode.title: 2nd Screen Mode
2ndScreenMode.description: Experience Palia with the map as your trusted companion in 2nd screen mode. Keep an eye on your surroundings while exploring the magical world.

overlayMode.title: Overlay Mode (Minimap)
overlayMode.description: Transform the map into a handy overlay mode, perfect for use as a minimap while you immerse yourself in the Palia adventure.

weeklyWants.title: Weekly Wants
weeklyWants.description: Stay updated on Palia's villagers' weekly wants and strengthen your bonds by fulfilling their desires. Some items even earn you extra love! üíï

filteringOptions.title: Filtering Options
filteringOptions.description: Effortlessly customize your Palia Map experience with a variety of filters, including filters for insects, foraging, mining, hunting, and more. Tailor the map to your exploration preferences.

multiLanguageSupport.title: Multi-Language Support
multiLanguageSupport.description: Access the Palia Map App in your preferred language with support for üá¨üáß English, üá©üá™ German, üá™üá∏ Spanish, üá´üá∑ French, and üáÆüáπ Italian.

download.note: The Palia Map App is designed to enhance your Palia adventure with a range of features including interactive maps, real-time player tracking, weekly wants, and more. Explore Palia like never before and create your own unique experiences in this magical world.

leaderboard.metaDescription: Check out the Palia App Leaderboard and see who has the highest rank and skill levels.
leaderboard.title: Palia App Leaderboard: Explore, Conquer, and Rise to the Top!
leaderboard.description: Embark on a thrilling journey in Palia and stand out among fellow adventurers with the Palia App Leaderboard. Discover where you rank in character level, skill proficiency, and showcase your character's name. To join this exclusive leaderboard, ensure you have the In-Game App installed. Dive into the world of Palia, track your progress, and compete with other players for the top spot! Unleash your skills, conquer challenges, and let the Palia App Leaderboard celebrate your achievements. Join the ranks of Palia's elite‚Äîyour adventure is about to be recognized!
leaderboard.name: Name

rummagePile.metaTitle: Discover Rummage Piles in Palia: Daily Treasures Await!
rummagePile.metaDescription: Uncover the secret locations of Rummage Piles in Kilima Valley. Scavenge once per day for exciting rewards after the Palia daily reset at 4:00 AM UTC. Explore with our interactive map and make the most of your daily adventures in Palia! üó∫Ô∏è‚ú®
rummagePile.title: Discover Rummage Piles in Palia: Daily Treasures Await!
rummagePile.description: Embark on a daily adventure in Kilima Valley and uncover the secret locations of Rummage Piles. These unique gatherables appear once per day at a random spot, offering players the chance to scavenge for exciting rewards. Interact with a Rummage Pile each day after the Palia daily reset at 4:00 AM UTC to claim your random reward. Use our interactive map to pinpoint the position of these hidden treasures and enhance your Palia experience. Don't miss out on the daily surprises‚Äîexplore the world of Palia with the Rummage Pile Map! üåü

winterfestChallenge.metaTitle: Conquer Zeki's Winterfest Challenge: Unveil the Secrets of the Seven Winterlights Chests!
winterfestChallenge.metaDescription: Embark on Zeki's festive challenge in Palia! Hunt down the seven hidden Winterlights Chests scattered around the village to claim your holiday treasures. Decode Zeki's hints, explore the scenic locations, and celebrate Winterlights with a thrilling quest. Unwrap the joy of the season in Palia! üéÅ‚ú®
winterfestChallenge.title: Conquer Zeki's Winterfest Challenge: Unveil the Secrets of the Seven Winterlights Chests!
winterfestChallenge.description: Join the festive spirit in Palia by taking on Zeki's Winterfest Challenge! Immerse yourself in the holiday cheer as you follow Zeki's cunning hints to locate the seven hidden Winterlights Chests scattered throughout the village. From the Inn's barrel of laughs to a cliff-top view of the boathouse, each chest holds a unique surprise for the keen adventurer. Explore, discover, and celebrate the season with the joyous quest crafted by Zeki. Gather your friends, unravel the mysteries, and make this Winterlights unforgettable in Palia! üéÑüîç

weeklyWants.subtitle: Weekly Wants Tracker: Uncover Palia's Villager Desires!
weeklyWants.description: Elevate your relationships with Palia's vibrant villagers using the Weekly Wants Tracker feature. Stay in the loop with each villager's unique desires for the week.

routes.hoverEndStep: Click any existing marker to finish
routes.explanatoryNameTooltip: Give this route an explanatory name
routes.informationText: You can add multiple lines and connect every node on the map. Right-click in edit mode removes a vertex.
